content:
Just a reminder that the January 2021 ballot cycle will include the first look at v2+, a modernized way of accessing the v2 base standard. Please sign up for the Consensus Group by Dec 17th and give us your feedback.
https://confluence.hl7.org/rest/hotovo/amazon-s3/1.0/buckets/52/content/download?path=v2%20Vision/V2+.pdf&targetId=90899833
